tasks

Class BranchAndBound

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Task<Solution<?>>
      • tasks.BranchAndBound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class BranchAndBound
extends Task<Solution<?>>
    This class represents a task involved in solving any combinatorial optimization problem (e.g. TSP) that uses the branch-and-bound technique.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Result<Solution<?>> execute()
        Executes the Branch and Bound task. It either executes an atomic task or composes the result for a successor task If the task is an atomic task, then the search tree represented by the current node is explored and the minimum solution is computed. Otherwise, if it is a successor task, the minimum solution is computed from all the (minimum) solutions corresponding to this successor's tasks.
        Specified by:
        execute in class Task<Solution<?>>
        Returns:
        Object of type T
        See Also:
        Task.execute()

      • isAtomic

        public boolean isAtomic()
        Description copied from class: Task

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true, if the task is atomic
